title: Home Delivery and Feature Setup
description: A customer has opted for home delivery of their new EV. A delivery specialist must transport the vehicle and walk the customer through its key features.

tasks.description: Transport the new vehicle to the customer's home at the scheduled time.
tasks.expected_outcome: The vehicle is delivered safely and on time.

tasks.description: Help the customer set up their mobile app and pair it with the vehicle.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer's phone is successfully paired, and they are logged into the app.

tasks.description: Provide a personalized tutorial on key EV features, such as charging, regenerative braking, and one-pedal driving.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer understands and is comfortable with the basic operation of their new EV.
